title: Where can I get detailed notes for the NEET biology? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is this book called biology NCERT. Buy it! Read it. Learn EVERY SINGLE LINE. Learn all the diagrams and there labellings by heart. Draw them multiple times. The most important things are the diagram descriptions. You will find many questions from these labellings. You will get 300+ guaranteed. For 30–40 extra marks, studying two times extra is illogical to me but still if you want to do it then go learn the Aakash package. The question doesn't demand it but still I will go on and blabber. Ignore these coaching institutes notes. The biology they teach seems fancy and interesting but it is a big time waste because your motive is to score in NEET, not research in biology. Instead, focus on physics and chemistry by solving N.Avasthi, M.S.Chouhan.,etc.

You will get Detailed notes for the NEET biology in Notespickup . Notespickup is an app where you get free notes,and written by expert.There are 200+ university. During this covid-19 many students have been effected on their studies ,to study notes for free notespickup is best app. To download use this link below: Notes Pickup - College Notes - Apps on Google Play
